opts.opt: Phase 1 Coarse level of recording intended to capture overall characteristics of a feature or site. Typically, this approach is used for complex features with multiple attributes that could potentially be recorded separately.

Phase 2 High resolution recording of discrete features present within a site or assemblage. For example, recording of individual buildings or structures, delineating boundaries of artefact scatters, hearths, faunal deposits or objects that together comprise a discrete feature
